title: Button
description: A customizable button component with multiple variants and sizes

body.raw:
# Button A versatile button component that supports multiple variants, sizes, and states. ## Examples ### Variants
### Sizes
### Loading State
### Disabled State
## Usage ```tsx import { Button } from "@serum/ui" export default function Example() { return (
) } ``` ## Props void", description: "Click handler function" } ]} /> The Button component also accepts all standard HTML button attributes.
